Dear Student_E,

Given our single-seat capacity, our policy is to hold the seat for a defined window for higher-priority candidates (Student_D, Student_A, and Student_C) to apply if they become unplaced at their higher-ranked schools.

To be specific: if we do not receive an [APPLY] from any of those higher-priority candidates by the end of **Round 10**, we will stop holding the seat purely as a precaution and will move to finalize the seat with the highest-priority remaining interested student who is ready to commit at that time.

If you would like to be considered immediately once that condition is met, please continue to check in, and you are also welcome to submit an [APPLY] in Round 10 so we can act promptly if the seat is no longer being held.

Sincerely,
School_D Admissions
